function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemics leading to an increase in robot adoption over time","Impact":"Potential over-reliance on automation may reduce employment opportunities for human workers","Mitigation":"Implement policies to ensure a balance between automation and human employment","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence and machine learning for adaptive automation","People":"Workers at risk of displacement due to increased automation","Owner":"Government and policy makers"},{"Description":"Global value chains dependent on cross-border capital flows","Impact":"Disruptions in cross-border capital flows can impact the interconnectedness of global value chains","Mitigation":"Diversification of funding sources and disaster recovery plans for financial globalization","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for secure and transparent cross-border transactions","People":"Stakeholders involved in global value chains and international trade","Owner":"Financial institutions and multinational corporations"},{"Description":"Effect of pandemics on trade and offshoring of the production process","Impact":"Pandemics may disrupt trade and offshoring activities, leading to supply chain disruptions","Mitigation":"Diversification of suppliers and localization of essential production processes","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems and predictive analytics for supply chain risk mitigation","People":"Businesses involved in global trade and offshoring","Owner":"Supply chain managers and business leaders"}]}
